alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 4:11PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Walker and Dade Counties through 445 PM EST... At 411 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Haletown (guild) to near Fackler, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Rossville, Lookout Mountain, Chattanooga Valley, Rising Fawn, Lakeview, Cole City, Wildwood, Stephensville, Chattanooga Valley, New England, Morganville, Hooker, Cloudland Canyon State Park and Fairview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
